org.epics.ioc.pdrv
Interface PortDriver

public interface PortDriver

This is implemented by a driver and is only called by org.epics.ioc.prev.Factory.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary
 Status connect(User user)
          Attempt to connect.
 Device createDevice(User user, java.lang.String deviceName)
          Create a new device for this port.
 Status disconnect(User user)
          Attempt to disconnect.
 java.lang.String report(int details)
          Report port specific information.
 

Method Detail

report

java.lang.String report(int details)
Report port specific information.

Parameters:
details - How much detail.
Returns:
The report.

createDevice

Device createDevice(User user,
                    java.lang.String deviceName)
Create a new device for this port.

Parameters:
user - The user connecting to a device.
deviceName - The deviceName.
Returns:
The device interface or null if it can not be created. If null is returned user.getMessage() provides the reason.

connect

Status connect(User user)
Attempt to connect.

Parameters:
user - The user.
Returns:
Status. Status.success means that the attempt was successful. If the attempt fails user.getMessage() describes why the request failed.

disconnect

Status disconnect(User user)
Attempt to disconnect.

Parameters:
user - The requester.
Returns:
Result. Status.success means that the attempt was successful. If the attempt fails user.getMessage() describes why the request failed.
